channel.title: OGLplus news
channel.description: The latest news from OGLplus.org site.

item.title: OGLplus 0.69.0 released.
item.description: New release version of OGLplus is available from github.

item.title: OGLplu2 0.3.0 released.
item.description: Check out version 0.3.0 of our new experimental wrapper for OpenGL written in C++14.

item.title: OGLplu2 0.2.0 released.
item.description: Check out version 0.2.0 of our new experimental wrapper for OpenGL written in C++14.

item.title: OGLplu2 0.1.0 released.
item.description: Check out our new experimental wrapper for OpenGL written in C++14.

item.title: OGLplus 0.67.0 released.
item.description: New release packages are available for download from SourceForge.

item.description: New release packages are available for download from SourceForge.

item.title: OGLplus 0.64.0 available on SF.

item.title: OGLplus 0.64.0 released.
item.description: New release packages are available for download. The packages will be also uploaded to Sourceforge, when the service is fully restored.
